email_body: That is fine...Just make sure you ensure the confidentiality of the floor is not compromised. Do not let him see any EOL entry screens. Thanks, John David P Dupre 08/02/2000 02:09 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Guest I have a friend at Prudential Securities who is interested in visiting the trading floors this week. He is in my capacity (back office) at Pru. Please let me know, Thanks David 3-3528 Steno: 275
